Grotius, his arguments for the truth of Christian religion rendred into plain English verse. De veritate religionis Christianae. English Grotius, Hugo, 1583-1645. Virgil. Bucolica. 4. English.
[16], 168 p.
Printed for Jonathan Robinson ..., London : 1686.
Translation of: De veritate religionis Christianae. "Virgil's fourth eclogue faithfully translated": p. 137-141. "Imprimatur, Dec. 16, 1685, Z. Isham" Errata on p. [16] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
